Comment: Absolutely stunning views of the Gateway of India! Worth every penny.
ManagerResponse: Thank you for your kind words! We hope to see you again soon.

Comment: The Royal Bengal is grand, but the check-in process was a bit slow.
ManagerResponse: We apologize for the delay. We are working on speeding up our reception desk.

Comment: Best budget stay in Kolkata. The pods are clean and the WiFi is fast!
Loved the heritage feel, but the room was quite drafty at night.
ManagerResponse: Thank you for the feedback. We are looking into improving our window insulation.

Comment: Waking up in the middle of Lake Pichola is a dream come true. Pure luxury.
Disappointed with the service. The pool was closed for maintenance during my whole stay.
ManagerResponse: We are deeply sorry for the inconvenience. Please contact us for a discount on your next stay.

Comment: Great vibe and modern design. Perfect for younger travelers.
Manali in the winter is beautiful. The heater in the room worked perfectly!
ManagerResponse: So glad you stayed warm! The snow views are indeed special this year.

Comment: Incredible rooftop view of Kolkata. Service was professional.
The room smelled like smoke even though it was a non-smoking floor.
ManagerResponse: This is against our policy. We are investigating which guest violated this to ensure it doesn't happen again.
